snippet: Manish Pandey led Kolkata Knight Riders as they fought back for their ninth straight victory, beating Kings XI Punjab for the title.
lead_paragraph: Manish Pandey led Kolkata Knight Riders as they fought back for their ninth straight victory, beating Kings XI Punjab for the title.

headline.main: Rank and File Star in Indian Premier League Final
headline.print_headline: Rank and File Star in Indian Premier League Final
